task.title: Define fallback ad behavior for VMAP inline ads
task.shortdesc: You can turn on fallback when a VMAP inline ad contains an invalid media type.

step.cmd: Set FallbackOnInvalidCreativeEnabled to YES to have VMAP fall back when the media type for a linear/inline ad is invalid for HLS.
step.info: The default value is NO. If a linear ad fails because it is has an invalid media type, or because the ad cannot be repackaged, this flag allows to follow the same fallback behavior as if the ad was an empty VAST wrapper.
